summary: This is just an .esp and .bsa I threw together using Skyrim NPC Editor, I edited Aela to where she's no longer an eyesore xD She's pretty now :)
descriptionHtml:
INSTALLATION: ﻿
<br /><br /><br />
<br /><br /><br />Drag and drop in your Data folder. Done. :) 
<br /><br /><br />
<br /><br /><br />Enjoy! Depending on the success of this mod, I'll make more Redone NPCs :) This is my first ever mod, I'm excited to see the reaction to it. Thanks for downloading it, endorse and leave me a comment if you guys would like for me to make more :)
author: Thewhitemagic
